I thank outgoing officials for their work and commitment. We will continue working for the quality of life of Colombians and for peace!
I accepted the resignation of the director of @fonade, Ariel Alfonso Aduen and I have assigned this unit to the director of @DNP_Colombia, Luis F. Mejía.
In front of @RTVCco, in replacement of @jjocampo_ I named José Jorge Dangond, with extensive experience in television and media.
I will present to the Board of @ Bancoldex Mario Suárez Melo, former director of @URosario as president of the bank in replacement of Luis Fernando Castro
In front of @FiduagrariaSA I have appointed Martha Lucía Rodríguez, who has a specialization in Government, Management and Public Affairs.
For the @Supernotariado I have appointed the lawyer Juana Bazán, ex-attorney general for family matters.
In @ICFEScol I have appointed Jorge Eliécer Lara, Doctor in Economics, with a specialization in Pedagogy and Teaching. It replaces Ximena Dueñas.
I appointed Yolanda Pinto, a great promoter of the rights of the victims, as the new Director of @UnidadVictimas, replacing Alan Jara.
In the position of High Councilor for the Regions @ACRegiones I have appointed the former Senator Camilo Sánchez.
In @Findeter I appointed, to succeed Luis Fernando Arboleda, Carlos Correa, current High Councilor @ACRegiones and a luxury official.
In Bienestar Familiar @ICBFColombia, in replacement of @cristinaplazasm I have appointed Juan Carlos López, current Manager of Colombia Mayor.
We will dedicate what is lacking in government, with more conviction and commitment, to improve quality of life, build peace and offer better opportunities.
I accepted with great regret resignation @aurelioIragorri @MinAgricultura. He will remain in office while he finishes controlling outbreaks of foot-and-mouth disease.

The Government has been austere and careful with resources. In the midst of fiscal squeeze, public spending last year was lower than in 2009.

There will be no foreign judges. All will be Colombian and will have the same qualities as the judges of our courts #ColombiaDeAcuerdo

Effective restriction of freedom was specified. Court will define specific issues such as the spaces for the sanctioned #ColombiaDeAcuerdo
Now, Farc will declare and deliver ALL their assets and money for the reparation of victims, on pain of losing benefits #ColombiaDeAcuerdo
